data.title: Hip Hop Till Infinity Exhibition: A Music Journey
data.meta_description: Take a journey through a legendary music genre - Hip Hop in exhibition and celebrate 50 years of its making with us. Discover what awaits you here.
data.text:
There will be parking available. Lighthouse Artspace LA is pleased to offer paid, on-site parking on a first-come, first-serve basis.

There are two parking lots on site. One underneath the venue with ADA access to the gallery. The entrance to this parking lot is located at 1430 N Cahuenga Boulevard. The second is an outdoor lot a short walk from the venue, the entrance located at 1406 Ivar Avenue.

Additional paid parking is available at the Dome Parking Structure, located at 1400 Ivar Avenue.

Use your Chase credit or debit card to buy one General Admission ticket and get one free, along with perks on-site*.

*Offer valid for on-site or online purchase. Cardholders must show their Chase credit or debit card and paid ticket on site in order to receive these benefits. A Chase debit or credit card is required for purchase. Offer not valid on pervious purchases and cannot be combined with any other offer. Offer may be revoked or modified at any time without notice and is subject to availability. Other restrictions/exclusions apply. Chase is not responsible for fulfillment of the offer. Deposit and credit card products provided by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. Member FDIC. Â© 2024 JPMorgan Chase & Co.

No vapes, cigarettes, lighters, matches or smoking devices allowed.

No knives, tasers, pepper spray, firearms, or weapons of any kind allowed.

You will be given an opportunity to put prohibited items in your vehicle and return for entry into the venue. For reasons of liability we can not keep or store any personal belongings.
